teamArchetypes.Imperial Unity: Space Marines + Adeptus. Custodes frontline, Marines damage, Sisters miracle revive. Strong late-game tank/sustain comp.
teamArchetypes.Chaos Warp Cult: Chaos Marines + Thousand Sons + Daemons + Psykers. Death-synergies, magic damage scaling, Chaos Spawn tokens.
teamArchetypes.Xenos Swarm: Tyranids + Orks + Necrons. Flood board, attrition, revive, and scaling damage.
teamArchetypes.Elite Strike Force: Deathwatch + Custodes + Vehicles + Psykers. Expensive, but strong counters. Rogue Trader fills gaps.
teamArchetypes.Cheap Swarm: Soldiers + Orks + Sororitas + Vehicles. Lots of bodies, miracle buffs, strong mid-game pressure.
